blogPost.title: How should brands think about their relationship with customers? Answer by Lee Hnetinka, Founder at @darkstore and @FastAF. https://t.co/5omEB0NUtc https://t.co/dTFPwpYfre
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ブランドはお客さまとの関係をどのように考えるべきでしょうか？Answer by Lee Hnetinka, Founder at @darkstore and @FastAF. https://t.co/5omEB0NUtc https://t.co/dTFPwpYfre
品牌应该如何思考他们与顾客的关系？由 @darkstore 和 @FastAF 的创始人 Lee Hnetinka 回答。https://t.co/5omEB0NUtc https://t.co/dTFPwpYfre
品牌應該如何思考他們與顧客的關係？由 @darkstore 和 @FastAF 的創始人 Lee Hnetinka 回答。https://t.co/5omEB0NUtc https://t.co/dTFPwpYfre

previous.title: How is today's political culture affecting the way women are treated at home and school? Answer by Joel Levin, Co-founder/Program Director, Stop Sexual Assault in Schools. https://t.co/OkVUSB7sw0 https://t.co/i83hqfZgK6

localize.full_text: 今日の政治文化は、家庭や学校での女性の扱いにどのような影響を与えているのでしょうか？回答：ジョエル・レビン（Stop Sexual Assault in Schools、共同設立者／プログラムディレクター） https://t.co/OkVUSB7sw0 https://t.co/i83hqfZgK6
今天的政治文化是如何影响妇女在家庭和学校的待遇的？回答者：Joel Levin，停止学校性侵犯组织的联合创始人/项目主任。https://t.co/OkVUSB7sw0 https://t.co/i83hqfZgK6
今天的政治文化是如何影響婦女在家庭和學校的待遇的？回答者：Joel Levin，停止學校性侵犯組織的聯合創始人/項目主任。https://t.co/OkVUSB7sw0 https://t.co/i83hqfZgK6

next.title: What are the most valuable career lessons people should learn early on in life? Answer by Partner @defyvc. https://t.co/Qp3eoYNtdR https://t.co/iRoCP5EBxs

localize.full_text: 人が人生の早い段階で学ぶべき最も価値のあるキャリアレッスンとは何でしょうか？Answer by Partner @defyvc. https://t.co/Qp3eoYNtdR https://t.co/iRoCP5EBxs
人们在人生的早期应该学习哪些最宝贵的职业课程？由合伙人@defyvc回答。https://t.co/Qp3eoYNtdR https://t.co/iRoCP5EBxs
人們在人生的早期應該學習哪些最寶貴的職業課程？由合夥人@defyvc回答。https://t.co/Qp3eoYNtdR https://t.co/iRoCP5EBxs
